content: Hey!I thought it would be nice to show how to create a Binance trading bot from the beginning, using Python.It's all based on this library: https://github.com/sammchardy/python-binanceCurrently there are 2 episodes live:Setting up everything:https://youtu.be/3yZ6CKMexcEGetting prices and assembling a basic strategy:https://youtu.be/NdJhZ7t2he8In the upcoming videos I will show more advanced and relevant strategies, along with key concepts while creating a bot Please, if you have more ideas you'd like to see please let me know!Happy coding!
